text: The Next Episode is the third studio album by American R&B; trio Next. It was released on J Records on December 17, 2002 in the United States.[ Next: The Next Episode] ==Track listing== ;Samples * "Imagine That" contains samples from the composition "If You Play Yours Cards Right", written by Kevin McCord by Alicia Meyers. * "Feels Good" contains replayed elements from the composition "(Theme From) Hill Street Blues", written by Michael Postil. * "Hold Me Down" contains excerpts from the composition "Saturday Night", written by Thomas McClary and Harold Hudson and performed by The Commodores. * "That's My Word" contains samples from the composition "Time Is Passing", written by Byron Byrd and performed by Sun. * "Brand New" contains samples from the composition "I Found Love (When I Found You)", written by Sherman Marshall and Phil Pugh and performed by The Spinners. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" | Chart (2002–03) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== *The Next Episode EXPLICIT LYRICS Category:2002 albums Category:Next (American band) albums Category:J Records albums
